index.create_room_dialog_hint_1: https://mornin.fm/#/ROOM-ID indicate an audio conferencing at ROOM-ID
index.create_room_dialog_hint_2: ROOM-ID could be alphabets or numbers, a simple word is good for a public room, a random string is good for private room.
index.headline_1: Mornin is an anonymous audio conferencing service
index.headline_2: Talk with your friends without installing App
